description: This file declares the interface for the CCSP Message Bus Service related to WiFi management, including function prototypes for engaging with the message bus, sending signals, registering components, and handling DBus messages. It is part of the CCSP (CPE Cloud Service Platform) framework for embedded Linux systems.
external_methods: BOOLEAN waitConditionReady(void*, const char*, char*, char*)

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages or initializes the message bus component with provided component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the WiFi Mbi component with user data.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes or cleans up resources for the WiFi Mbi component.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check or validation of the message bus state or connection.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources with a specified priority for the WiFi Mbi component.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_SendParameterValueChangeSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating that a parameter's value has changed.

methods.name: CcspPandM_path_message_func
methods.description: Handles incoming DBus messages on a specified path, acting as a message handler callback.

methods.name: ssp_WifiMbi_RegisterToCR
methods.description: Registers the component to the CCSP Control Registry.

methods.name: waitConditionReady
methods.description: Waits until a specified condition or component is ready, based on provided identifiers.

calls: BOOLEAN waitConditionReady(void*, const char*, char*, char*)
